/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The image is captured during the day, under bright sunlight, which illuminates the scene and enhances the colors.
